title: How influential has Bielsa really been?
shortDescription: In conversation with Marcelo Bielsa himself, an examination of the idea that he is one of the game's most influential coaches.

title: Goodwin named Aberdeen manager
shortDescription: Aberdeen have appointed Jim Goodwin as their new manager on a two-and-a-half-year deal.

title: Pep reveals City tried to sign Kane four times
shortDescription: Pep Guardiola says Manchester City approached Tottenham four times over signing Harry Kane last summer.

title: Europe: Torino dent Juve title hopes
shortDescription: Juventus' faint Serie A title hopes were further dented by local rivals Torino, who fought their way back to earn a deserved 1-1 draw in Friday night's Turin derby.

title: Papers: Barca ready 'extensive' Haaland package
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Saturday's national newspapers...

title: Rathbone stunner as Rotherham hold Wigan
shortDescription: Ollie Rathbone's stunning strike ensured Rotherham kept Wigan at arm's length in the Sky Bet League One title race after a 1-1 draw at the AESSEAL New York Stadium.

title: Bury fans' group complete Gigg Lane purchase
shortDescription: A Bury fans' group has completed a deal to purchase Gigg Lane from the administrator.

title: McGee: The goalkeeper starring in Forest Green's second wind
shortDescription: Luke McGee on starting out at Tottenham, Forest Green's second wind and why Rovers head coach Rob Edwards is "one of the most genuine people I have come across"

title: Premier League previews: Leeds vs Man Utd, Wolves vs Leicester
shortDescription: Team news, stats, predictions and how to follow the Premier League on Sunday as Leeds host Manchester United, live on Sky Sports.

title: Scottish Premiership previews: Dundee Utd vs Rangers live on Sky
shortDescription: The Scottish Premiership returns this weekend, with team news, stats and how to follow plus Dundee United vs Rangers live on Sky Sports on Sunday.

title: Morton boss Imrie gets 10-game ban for betting offences
shortDescription: Morton manager Dougie Imrie has been hit with a 10-game ban for betting offences.

title: PL Predictions: Why Spurs can stop the Man City machine
shortDescription: Jones Knows thinks the odds surrounding Tottenham's chances of avoiding defeat at Man City are too good to pass up in this week's Premier League predictions.

title: Bournemouth-Forest off after Storm Eunice damages Vitality Stadium
shortDescription: Nottingham Forest's Championship fixture at Bournemouth on Friday night has been postponed after damage was caused to the Vitality Stadium by Storm Eunice.

title: Live PL on Sky: Arsenal vs Liverpool announced
shortDescription: Arsenal's rescheduled home Premier League encounter with Liverpool at the Emirates Stadium will take place live on Sky Sports next month.

title: Back 15/2 weekend treble  - Jones Knows
shortDescription: Our tipster Jones Knows has a 15/2 Saturday treble to attack and wants to back goals and shots when Southampton meet Everton.

title: Moyes: Zouma better after 'bad illness' | Could play vs Newcastle
shortDescription: David Moyes says West Ham defender Kurt Zouma has recovered from a "bad illness" and should be available for selection against Newcastle on Saturday.

title: Subscribe to the Essential Football Podcast
shortDescription: Listen to the latest episode and subscribe to the Essential Football Podcast from Sky Sports Football.

title: Can Spurs trip Man City up at the Etihad?
shortDescription: Essential Football Podcast: Can Spurs trip Man City up at the Etihad? | Race for the top four continues with Man Utd and Wolves in action on Super Sunday...

title: Rangnick: Some players were unhappy, but atmosphere has improved
shortDescription: Ralf Rangnick admits he had to appease a bloated squad prior to the closure of the January transfer window but says the atmosphere at Man Utd has now improved.

title: Klopp on Jota injury concern: It could go either way
shortDescription: Diogo Jota has been ruled out of Liverpool's clash with Norwich due to an ankle ligament injury.
